mapper.select: SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '病案号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MR_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '病人姓名是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出院时间是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '患者卡证号码是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDNO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '患者卡证类型是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '开嘱科室编码是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DPT_CODE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '开嘱科室名称是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DPT_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '开嘱医生身份证号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DOC_IDCARD IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '开嘱医生姓名是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DOC_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '没有记录患者出生日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '是否药品是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_DRUG IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '停止执行医生身份证号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND STPDOC_IDCARD IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '停止执行医生姓名是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND STPDOC_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '性别代码是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '药品使用途径说明是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND USEWAY_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医疗机构编码是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_CODE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医疗机构名称是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱备注说明是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_NOTE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱编号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱开始执行时间是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BEGIN_TIME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱类别是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_TYPE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱明细编码是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_CODE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱明细名称是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱停止执行时间是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND STOP_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱唯一ID号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ID IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱下达时间是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODRISU_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱组号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_GN IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '执行护士姓名是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NURSE_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '住院号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND HP_S_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出生日期是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出生日期是否早于1900年01月01日' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY<=TO_DATE('1900-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '卡证类型代码是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE not in ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','99') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '是否药品填写是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_DRUG not in ('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医疗机构编码是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_CODE !='320583467170265' union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医院记录患者性别是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX not in ('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱开始执行时间是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BEGIN_TIME>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱开始执行时间是否早于1950年01月01日' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BEGIN_TIME<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱类别填写是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_TYPE not in ('1','2','9') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱停止执行时间是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND STOP_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱停止执行时间是否早于1950年01月01日' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND STOP_DT<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱下达时间是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODRISU_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱下达时间是否早于1950年01月01日' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODRISU_DT<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT ORGAN_NAME , HP_S_NO , '病案号是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MR_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录的详细描述是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND HOS_COURSE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录日期是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_DATE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录唯一ID号是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_ID IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病人姓名是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '归档日期时间是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '患者就诊卡证号码是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDNO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '患者就诊卡证类型是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '没有记录患者出生日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否不明原因肺炎病例是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_UN_PNEU IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否传染病或疑似病例是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_INF_CASE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否危重病例是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_CRI_CASE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否疑难病例是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_DIF_CASE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '首次/日常病程记录标识是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_MARK IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '性别代码是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '医疗机构编码填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_CODE !='320583467170265' union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '医疗机构名称是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '医生身份证号码是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DOC_IDCARD IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '医生姓名是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '医嘱内容的详细描述是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DOC_CONT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '主要诊断疾病代码是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MDIS_CODE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '住院号是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND HP_S_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '住院科室编码是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DPT_CODE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '住院科室名称是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DPT_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录日期是否晚于系统日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_DATE>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录日期是否早于1950年01月01日' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_DATE <= TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录日期是否早于出生日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_DATE <= BIRTHDAY union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '出生日期是否晚于系统日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '出生日期是否早于1900年01月01日' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY <= TO_DATE('1900-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录日期是否早于出生日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_DATE <= BIRTHDAY union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '出生日期是否晚于系统日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '出生日期是否早于1900年01月01日' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY <= TO_DATE('1900-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '归档日期是否晚于系统日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '归档日期是否早于出生日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT <= BIRTHDAY union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '卡证类型代码是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE not in ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','99') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否不明原因肺炎病例填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_UN_PNEU not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否传染病或疑似病例填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_INF_CASE not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否危重病例填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_CRI_CASE not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否疑难病例填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_DIF_CASE not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '首次或者日常病程记录标识是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_MARK not in ('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '医院记录患者性别是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX not in ('1','2')
